campaign.story:
JON SABLE, FREELANCE by MIKE GRELL 
It is official! Kickstarter Loves MIKE GRELL!
ATTENTION: 
JUST ADDED:
BONUS: Final Milestone Goal: If we cross $70,000 or reach 500 backers, we will include a free WARLORD Portfolio Slipcase with the prints! A newly designed, custom slipcase to keep those gorgeous prints nice, snug, and safe!

FINAL Add ON OF THE CAMPAIGN:
Just Add $25 to your pledge amount, and let us know you want THE WARLORD!
This epic collection is brought to you thanks to the great Grell friends and fans, Ruth and Darrin Sutherland! Check out their Mike Grell podcast:  https://www.facebook.com/warlordworlds/community/?ref=page_internal 

 UNLOCKED: NEW MILESTONE GOAL 
BONUS PREMIUM
WHEN WE REACH 450 BACKERS,
EVERYONE WHO PLEDGES HARD COPY AND ABOVE
WILL RECEIVE THIS EXCLUSIVE
GREEN ARROW AND BLACK CANARY
TRADING CARD SET BY
MIKE GRELL
AVAILABLE ONLY AS A CROWDFUNDING PREMIUM


That's right. Green Arrow and Black Canary Masterstroke Trading cards. Only available to backers of this campaign. You won't be able to get them outside of the Sable Omnibus crowdfunding projects!
All we have to do is hit, or pass, 450 backers total by the time the campaign ends, and everyone gets these for FREE, added to their final packages!



 JON SABLE FREELANCE SKETCHBOOK
Any backer who is in for physical rewards, all you have to do is add $35 to your pledge per copy of the Sketchbook. Then comment to us that you have added it, and we'll make sure you get one! (The folks who pledged at the Ultimate Fan level will get these included for free)
AND... Did you miss previous items on previous campaigns?
Well, now you can add on any of these items as well:
Prices are indicated on each item
The Grell And Grell Legion Sketchbooks are $35 each
The Grell Legion Sketchcards are $25 for each set of 27 cards
Maggie The Cat #1 (64 pages) is $10
The Pilgrim Volume 1 (80 pages) is $15
Simply add the amount for the item(s) you wish to add to your pledge, and message to let us know what item you are adding. It's that simple.

We are also on our way to Stretch Goals now!
STRETCH GOALS
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #1: $56,000! When we hit this goal, we will include an exclusive JON SABLE Omnibus collection bookmark, and an exclusive Kickstarter JON SABLE sketch card from Mike Grell!
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #2: $58,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a digital video file of a nearly 2 hour live filmed docu-interview with Mike Grell, filmed in 2018! All backers will have their names listed in the credits as special thanks! Some pledge levels include more prominent credits as well. This "Inside The Actors Studio" type interview is a perfect companion to the Eisner Award nominated "Life Is Drawing Without An Eraser" book from TwoMorrows Publishing! A must for Grell fans. (If we cross $100K, look for this film to go from downloadable, to a full DVD!)
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #3: $60,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a JON SABLE Companion, volume 1. This will include reprints of all the original letters pages from the issues within this volume, as well as a Who's Who style section of characters, and a guide to guns as seen and used in the pages of this volume, plus more bonus content like rare in-house ads from the original run, etc. A unique companion to the omnibus collection! 24 pages of color and black and white images!
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #4: $65,000!  When we hit this goal, we will include the first set (in 5 total sets) of JON SABLE FREELANCE trading cards! Unique collectibles, with characters from the series. By the time we produce all 5 volumes, you'll have a full set of  25 cards, but it all starts with this initial set of cards.
STRETCH GOAL #5: $70,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a brand new Mike Grell Jon Sable art print that will have a classic cinema poster look to it akin to classic James Bond film posters! A unique Jon Sable item for sure!

New Milestone Goal: UNLOCKED!!!!! 
We hit 400 total backers! All backers will get this exclusive Masterstroke Studios Trading Card: 
The Iconic white on black image of Jon Sable, as one of Masterstroke's Trading Cards, with Masterstroke logo on the back. This card will be a rare collectible item that joins the Maggie The Cat exclusive card, The Pilgrim un-used cover art cards, and Mike Grell's Legion of Super Heroes sketchcards!

JUST ADDED: COMIC SHOPS can get 2 or 3 copies at a deep discount! This is the only way to get copies of the Omnibus in your local comic shop! So let your favorite retailer know that they can get JON SABLE, FREELANCE Deluxe Hardcover Omnibus Volume 1 before anyone else!
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.
RETURN OF A CLASSIC FOR A NEW GENERATION
Mike Grell's JON SABLE, FREELANCE was a trailblazing comic book in the 1980s. 
JON SABLE, FREELANCE, the story of a former African hunter in the concrete jungle, was one of the earliest successes among independent comics of the 1980s.  A top seller, SABLE often saw higher sales and critical praise than Batman, Superman, Spiderman, Avengers, and many other mainstay titles. It was one of the comics of the era that helped redefine what the medium could achieve.
After successful Kickstarter campaigns to revive Mike Grell’s MAGGIE THE CAT and his collaboration with actor/writer Mark Ryan on THE PILGRIM, Grell’s Masterstroke Studios imprint is giving one of his most popular creations a massive new release: JON SABLE, FREELANCE.
It is notable that SABLE has never gotten the Deluxe Hardcover Omnibus treatment it deserves. IDW released a series of trade paperbacks in the early 2000s, and Comicmix published smaller sized paperback omnibus editions in the last decade. Masterstroke is upping the game by going for over-sized editions that will be definitive versions of the legendary series.
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.

HERE'S THE PLAN:
Over the next couple of years, Masterstroke Studios will be releasing JON SABLE, FREELANCE, the definitive omnibus collection in 5 volumes, with the final volume being launched in time for Mike Grell's 75th birthday in September of 2022.

Each volume will consist of approximately 400 pages of content, including all of the issues, all of the covers, and heaps of bonus materials (some never before seen). These editions will be over-sized (think DC Absolute Editions), showing the pages bigger than they have ever been seen before. Each volume will have a dustjacket with new art by Mike Grell. Key issues will have commentary from Grell about the story and behind the scenes insights. And there will be lots of other goodies thrown in as well (including a companion book of original letters column pages, old house ads, and other rare bits and pieces from the history of JON SABLE, FREELANCE!)

VOLUME 1 covers issues #1 - #13, completing the first major story arc of Sable, from his origins as an Olympic athlete, to his life and lose living with his family in Africa, to his personal death wish as a gun-for-hire upon his return to America. The first volume concludes with Sable's return to Vietnam to find a man missing in action.

Grell's gritty, yet emotionally grounded tales are a slice of mid-1980s current events, politics and intrigue, blended with action and adventure. The entire series is a unique time capsule of an era, while also remaining relevant and fresh for a new generation. 

THIS KICKSTARTER
This is where it all begins. This Kickstarter is to fund the creation and production of Volume 1 (and possibly Volume 2 if we cross $100K on this campaign) of the Deluxe Hardcover Omnibus series.
We've spent months planning every detail of this campaign to make it as efficient and straightforward as possible.

We've set the price point at a comparable retail market price for other similar volumes rather than elevate the price point on Kickstarter, as so many projects do.  It is not uncommon to pay upwards of $30 for a single issue of a comic on Kickstarter (which is based on the cost of creation for writers and artists. Comics are not cheap to create and publish, no doubt about it). But since this material already exists, the costs are a bit lower for us. This means we can focus on making the presentation of the material the best it can be. We can also begin advance work on the next volumes, as we prepare to launch them in the coming months.

We see fans who contribute to projects get frustrated when they see the same books available months later for a fraction of what they pledged. And while these editions will be made widely available later on down the line, you will pay the same price to support it here that you would to buy it next year in your local comic shops and other retailers. AND... these editions will contain Kickstarter exclusive aspects that those others won't. These will be the first, and rarest versions of the omnibus set, guaranteed. 
A unique page of art in the front of the book will be exclusive to this Kickstarter, and some copies of this Kickstarter backed volume will come with an exclusive bookplate that will be signed and numbered. As well, the names of backers of this project will be listed in the back of the book, thanking them for their frontline support of Mike Grell's work. As well, some fans can get special recognition, including sketches of their likenesses being used for an exclusive trading card set! 
There are many perks beyond just getting the book. You can get a limited number of original Grell commissioned sketches (some of them inside the book itself, making your copy all the more unique).

This is a massive project that we're breaking up over two years and five volumes, that, when complete, will be the final word on the original JON SABLE adventures.
Early bird pricing saves you even more. If you pledge in the first 48 hours, you end up saving an additional $25 on the book, which will retail for $100 down the road when offered for Local Comic Shops.

What you get: 
JON SABLE, FREELANCE Masterstroke Edition Volume 1.
There are many other pledge levels that include sketches, other Masterstroke publications you may have missed, and a whole host of other unique opportunities to be backers at higher levels and get even more out of this amazing project!
As we surpass our funding goal, and unlock Stretch Goals, there are even more great surprises in store, from trading cards, a Sable poster, a feature length Mike Grell video interview, trading cards, art portfolio prints, and even a chance to get Volume 2 of the omnibus set at a discounted rate after we pass a certain funding goal.
Lots of cool things await! And this is just the beginning.

EARLY BIRD BACKER BONUS!
The first 100 Backers will get an exclusive Sable art print by Mike Grell that will be exclusive to this campaign! A one of a kind (well, one of one hundred) piece, this will be a great bonus for fans!

 DID YOU MISS THE OTHER MASTERSTROKE KICKSTARTERS?
Fear not! You can catch up on everything Grell right here with this campaign.
That's right. You will be able to get Maggie The Cat, The Pilgrim, Jon Sable black and white bonus comic, Rules of The Hunt, The Mike Grell Sketchbook, The Legion of Super Heroes Sketchbook and Sketch Cards, and more!
There's a pledge level that catches you up, but we will also be announcing ways to add on individual items you may have missed along the way!

SOME OTHER SURPRISES AWAIT
Working from original plates of the page art, Mike Grell will be able to go back into select issues and pages, and clean up some of the art, making it sharper, clearer, and better looking than ever before.
We're mindful of not altering the original art, but rather we are planning to lovingly improve the art, colors and pages where needed to make this the best looking, and most definitive version of Sable.
In future volumes of the set, there will new color added to some issues, as well as new artwork. (Keep reading...)
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.
Each of the planned five volumes will clock in at around 400 pages. They will be larger than we’ve ever seen SABLE, measuring approximately 8.5 by 12.25 inches (the same size as the DC Comics Absolute Edition releases) with glossy interior pages, rare materials (including never before seen artwork), all new covers, and dust jackets that will line up to form a complete image when placed in order on a shelf. Each volume will retail for $100.

JON SABLE'S Back!
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.
That's right! Mike Grell's classic is making a triumphant return in a deluxe hardcover format for the first time!
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.

The original cover to JSF #1 from First Comics back in 1982!
A gallery of original covers for the issues that will be contained within Volume 1
 This two page spread from Jon Sable, Freelance #1 has been lovingly preserved, while also increasing the quality from the original newsprint pages to a bright glossy finish! This is the best Sable has ever looked!
 The original cover to the SABEL novel from 2000. It has been revised and re-edited for an all new release, and you can get it digitally though this campaign!

 But it shouldn't scare you, the fans! It should excite you! Jon Sable's triumphant return will be a FAN driven publication! By the fans, for the fans! This is the ultimate presentation of JON SABLE!
This is how the original series stacks up. Now, imagine it bigger, bolder, brighter, and more badass than ever before! 

 THE FUTURE
With 5 total volumes needed to collect the entire run of 56 original issues, 12 additional issues, and other bonus appearances (anyone remember Mike Grell's 5 page in "Word Warriors" literacy awareness comic in 1987? How about that 5 page Hero Initiative benefit comic in 2014? The black and white "Rules Of The Hunt" bonus comic from the "Maggie The Cat" Kickstarter? Yes, we will have it ALL!) of Jon Sable, each volume will be approximately 400 pages in length, with extensive bonuses.

Astute fans will recall that late in the original run of JSF, Mike Grell left the art chores behind, bringing in a host of talented artists to draw the issues. They were all great artists in their own right, but it just wasn't the same without Grell at the pencil.

Well, we're about to make an announcement that will blow the minds of fans:
Volumes 4 and 5 of this omnibus series will feature issues of JSF, redrawn by Mike Grell himself!
We've got Stephen B Scott along to assist with finishes to Mike's pencils for some of the backgrounds and some of the issues. Mike will be fully drawing several of the key issues, and providing pencils for the rest. This will be like seeing 13 issues worth of JSF the way that they were meant to be, for the first time in over 30 years! This is a unique opportunity for Mike to go back and do those issues the way he envisioned them from the start!
I'm excited just typing that. Honestly, as a fan (and editor for the project) I feel like we're going to discover a lost treasure of Mike Grell art! And I don't know of any other instances of artists reaching that far back and redrawing whole issues of comics.

But it all starts here, with Volume 1. We need to fund this project, and get the printing presses rolling on this set of omnibus editions. In many ways, this campaign will be the foundation upon which all future Mike Grell Masterstroke Studios projects will be built. So, we need you, the fans, now more than ever! The more successful this initial campaign is, the more poised for bringing you the absolute, ultimate, best SABLE possible.
This is the moment all Grell fans have been waiting for!
STRETCH GOALS
STRETCH GOAL #1: $56,000! When we hit this goal, we will include an exclusive JON SABLE Omnibus collection bookmark, and an exclusive Kickstarter JON SABLE sketch card from Mike Grell!
STRETCH GOAL #2: $58,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a digital video file of a nearly 2 hour live filmed docu-interview with Mike Grell, filmed in 2018! All backers will have their names listed in the credits as special thanks! Some pledge levels include more prominent credits as well. This "Inside The Actors Studio" type interview is a perfect companion to the Eisner Award nominated "Life Is Drawing WIthout An Eraser" book from TwoMorrows Publishing! A must for Grell fans. (If we cross $100K, look for this film to go from downloadable, to a full DVD!)
STRETCH GOAL #3: $60,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a JON SABLE Companion, volume 1. This will include reprints of all the original letters pages from the issues within this volume, as well as a Who's Who style section of characters, and a guide to guns as seen and used in the pages of this volume, plus more bonus content like rare in-house ads from the original run, etc. A unique companion to the omnibus collection! 24 pages of color and black and white images!
STRETCH GOAL #4: $65,000!  When we hit this goal, we will include the first set (in 5 total sets) of JON SABLE FREELANCE trading cards! Unique collectibles, with characters from the series. By the time we produce all 5 volumes, you'll have a full set of  25 cards, but it all starts with this initial set of cards.
STRETCH GOAL #5: $70,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a brand new Mike Grell Jon Sable art print that will have a classic cinema poster look to it akin to classic James Bond film posters! A unique Jon Sable item for sure!
STRETCH GOAL #6: $75,000! When we hit this goal, we will include the first 2 limited art print plates of the JON SABLE art portfolio. Once all 5 volumes of the omnibus are finished, there will be a full portfolio (in a unique slipcase) of 10 art prints. 
AND WE HAVE EVEN MORE STRETCH GOALS PLANNED, SO KEEP AN EYE OUT....
We have some MAJOR plans for Stretch Goals that go up to $100,000, and include some amazing items! So help us get funded, and we will reveal a new Stretch Goal each day over the next 5 days following hitting our funding goal!
* Note: Stretch Goal rewards are only available to backers who pledge on physical levels, not digital.

MILESTONE GOALS:
Be sure and keep an eye out for bonus items being offered when we hit certain milestones along the way! (Milestones are, for example, when we hit our 250th backer, 500th backer, etc.)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
All of the material for this volume already exists, and is ready for publication. Some of the bonuses and perks will take a little time to complete, but we are aiming to get this book into the hands of the backers by Christmas! What a Christmas gift that will be for Grell fans, right?
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: No update update. But thought you should know
updates.update_content:
I wanted to check in and let you all know that work continues on the project. The recolor/touch up process is very time intensive. The fact that the first 13 issues were originally on newsprint, and were colored with that in mind WAAAAY back in the day, has created some interesting obstacles in preserving versus upscaling the colors.
Glenn Hauman is doing a tremendous job.
Lucky for us (and you guys), starting with issue 14, JON SABLE went to a higher grade of paper, and better coloring overall. So, the future volumes will be considerably easier to touch up.

Just in case anyone is sending messages and not getting replies, let me give you all a heads up:
We are going to send out info as Updates (like this one) when we have it, so incoming questions will largely go unanswered unless you post comments ONLY under one of the updates. That way I (Jeff) will be able to access and see them easily. Mike can't go through all the messages and reply to them, as his focus must remain on the work and not the Kickstarter in box. I post updates when we have them, and respond to comments here.

Good things come to those who wait. That's the age old saying.
Sable progress continues, albeit slower than we would like, but we are taking an approach of getting it right, rather than getting it fast.
We're looking at proofs, re-sizing, tweaking, and paying attention to every little detail. We want to get this one perfect. And with the knowledge that once we get Volume 1 locked down, the future Volumes will be easier to produce because we will have set the whole format in stone after this first one.

Just saw the proofs for the trading cards for this campaign, and they look great. 
Prepping the Warlord prints for production.
Working on the companion book, revisiting those old letters columns.
A proof copy has been produced to get a feel for exact size and weight, even though the pages inside that proof are not the final pages.

Hope everyone is doing great.
Work continues on the SABLE hardcover, as the color process continues, and we assemble the bonus goodies that were part of the Kickstarter campaign.
Since the production end of things is taking a little longer than we would have liked, I thought it might be a great time to reveal an early look at the documentary video interview with Mike from 2018.

Update time.
We are about to get a look at a physical proof for the book itself. This is a slightly more time consuming process, but one we deem necessary in order to make sure we get the absolute best quality product. After all, we're not kidding around here. This is intended to be "definitive" when it comes to Jon Sable Freelance.
The remaster/recolor process is still underway, and looking great. But it is delicate work. And Glenn Hauman is doing a masterful job of taking every inch of every page and carefully modernizing the colors without changing them from the original Janice Cohen colors.

First, the good news: We hope to have some of the remastered/re-colored pages to show soon. Perhaps even a side by side comparison for you to see exactly what work is being done. This first volume is one that we want to make sure we get right, and Glenn Hauman of ComicMix is doing slow, patient work, panel by panel, page by page, to modernize the color palate while still maintaining the original colors of the books.
We're talking about issues of comics that were originally newsprint (which absorbs colors in ways that can make the pages look murky and over-saturated) being updated to look as good as any modern comic, but without entirely recoloring with modern technics.

All surveys have gone out, as of just moments ago.
Please fill them out fully and return them as soon as possible.
We are, hopefully, about a month away from having the book ready for the printer. Obviously, any number of things could come up and create small delays, but we are hopeful to keep on a tight schedule.

Hey folks -
Just to keep you in the loop, we are continually moving forward with all the work involved in completing this project.  We've seen the first few pages of remastered colors, and they look great! We are doing the delicate balance of preserving the original, while improving the colors without changing the look of the original pages.  I saw a totally re-colored page from Sal Buscema's Conan art, and thought they went too far and changed too much with the new colors. It doesn't even look like the same art anymore. And we're talking special care here to make sure that does not happen to Sable. Needless to say, this is taking some time, and a lot of attention to detail. In the end it will be well worth it.

updates.update_userinfo: Just to check in with you all
updates.update_content:
Just wanted to check in and let folks know that work continues on the JSF omnibus! We've got a lot of things going on, in the process of getting it all ready to go to the printer later next month, and we'll give you updates accordingly.
For what it is worth, we probably won't have a lot to update you on until things are much further along. As well,  Mike is busy at work on a surprise next project, and he won't be able to check back here all that frequently, so please keep questions, message and other general queries and comments to a minimum if you don't mind. We will post updates when there's new news to know, so just be patient and know that we're spending time making it all come together so you will get a fantastic finished product!

campaign.story:
The high-speed thrills kick into overdrive in IGNITION: Issue #2! 
The last time we left Jemele Reid, she was banned from the world of professional racing, fighting for custody rights to see her son, and lost everything. Now, to make ends meet, Jemele takes an offer from a mysterious person named Spencer Avery.

Spencer needs he and his special cargo driven from Dayton, OH, to Las Vegas within a small time frame to satisfy his client, Mr. Wolf. And no one denies Mr. Wolf.

For Jemele, there's no turning back, and what seems to be a high-speed job could end up being even more than she ever imagined. Get ready for a ride of a lifetime. 

Welcome to IGNITION: ISSUE #2!
IGNITION is a comic book mini-series written by Shawn Pryor & Jenna Lyn Wright, with sequential artwork and lettering by Kelly Guillory. The first Kickstarter for IGNITION: Issue #1 was an arousing success, so now we're back to give you more of this high-octane tale!
This campaign is to raise funds for production and print costs for the 28-page IGNITION: Issue #2 comic and, hopefully, hit a few stretch goals on this crowdfunding journey. With your support, we can be successful and continue to give you all more for your money. IGNITION: Issue #2 will be printed in a 5.5" x 8.5" digest-sized format, on a nice 80 lb matte laminated paper stock, with a 130 lb matte laminated cover.
WHERE THE FUNDS ARE GOING
The money raised for the IGNITION: Issue #2 campaign will go towards paying our series artist, Kelly Guillory, printing costs, backer rewards, and shipping costs. If we end up smashing our initial goal, all additional funding will be used to produced awards from our campaign stretch goals, additional content for the series, per-page-rate bonuses for the creative team, possible future content, and more. We'll give you the best that we have with every issue, always.  

REWARDS & STRETCH GOALS
If you missed IGNITION: Issue #1, don't worry because we're offering a 2nd Printing of Issue #1 for this campaign!
And you'll also be able to add-on additional items to your pledge during this campaign! No Backerkit needed! :)
THE IGNITION CREATIVE TEAM!
Shawn Pryor - Writer: Shawn Pryor is the creator and co-writer of the all-ages graphic novel mystery series CASH & CARRIE, the 2019 GLYPH Nominated football/drama series FORCE, and the writer of KENTUCKY KAIJU and THE FIRE WITHIN.
He has also written stories for Mike Norton’s BATTLEPUG and Tee Franklin’s BINGO LOVE: JACKPOT EDITION (Image Comics), multiple titles for CAPSTONE PUBLISHING, and wrote and produced an unofficial Power Rangers comic called TOTAL ECLIPSE.
 In his free time, he enjoys reading, cooking, listening to streaming music playlists, and talking about why Zack from the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is the greatest Black superhero of all-time.
Jenna Lyn Wright - Writer: Jenna Lyn Wright is a screenwriter of horror, science fiction, action-adventure, and author of urban and dark fantasy. She grew up reading Grimm's Fairy Tales and Stephen King novels and digs coffee, Converse, whiskey, and ass-kicking heroines. Her books feature all of the paranormal creatures she wishes were real.
Kelly Guillory - Artist and Letterer: K. Guillory is a comic artist originally from Detroit who is now based on the East Coast. She is a recipient of the Joe Schuster Gene Day award for her work in Wayward Sisters and was nominated for an Ignatz Award for the same anthology in 2019.
Jay Reed - Logo Design: Half Man, Half Amazing, Jay Reed is an illustrator and designer based on the west coast, who has worked on a multitude of projects which include F.O.R.C.E., The Kool Kids, and Content with KAOS.
Thank You!
Thank you for taking out the time to look at our project, and thank you so much for your support. It means everything to us!
Music in the Kickstarter video by BENSOUND.COM.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is my eighth Kickstarter project. I always make sure that every Kickstarter that I run is properly communicated and fulfilled.

While all creative projects have their share of challenges and issues, I have a good grasp on what it takes to handle and manage a Kickstarter project and understand that your pledges mean something, and I plan on fulfilling them.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hey everyone,
Sorry for the delayed reply. I've been slammed, the weather has been terrible the last three weeks, and my mother and step-father have covid, and I've been dealing with that as well and making sure that they get the help and treatment they need.

Needless to say, life is a lot right now, but like all of you, I am doing what I can.

Hey everybody!

I can't say thanks enough for every one of you who backed IGNITION #2. Because of you, our special mini-series continues. Thank you. 

The Kickstarter ends tonight at 8 pm EST. So this is your last chance if you wanted to add-on any additional items to your pledge if that interests you. I won't be running a Backerkit for this Kickstarter, so once this KS is done, that's it. :)

Hey, Y'all!
Well, we got a nice boost over the last 24 hours, and now we're a little over $900 away from reaching our goal and crossing the finish line. I can't say thanks enough for all your support, pledges, and spreading the word. I hope we can make it. With only five days left, I'm worried, but I have to keep pushing.

Hey everyone!
Well, we've got a little over nine days left and $1,387 to go! 
Can we do it! I believe that we can. Thanks again to everyone that has been spreading the word and supporting us. It keeps us going and keeps this project alive!
I'm going to fight until the clock hits zero to get to our goal.

project_data.project_name: IGNITION #1 - #2: High-Speed Action and Thrills!

campaign.story:
NOTE: We hit our first THREE stretch goals and so now each and every backer will receive a beautiful print (see below), a Rylend Grant Comicsverse Card set, AND our BONUS DIGITAL EXTRAVAGANZA, a virtual cornucopia of books from the hottest creators in comics. So, essentially, you're now getting about 16 different comic issues and a print for this one pledge. 
THE PEACEKEEPERS is a new comic book series from writer Rylend Grant, artist Davi Leon Dias, colorist Iwan Joko Triyono, and letterer HdE... the same twisted team that brought you 10 rip-roaring issues of Action Lab: Danger Zone's critically-lauded political action thriller ABERRANT.  Aberrant won a Mike Wieringo Comic Book Industry Award (for BEST VILLAIN) in 2019 and was nominated for two others (BEST WRITER & BEST SINGLE ISSUE).
This campaign will fund a gorgeous 64 pg perfect-bound comic book collecting Issues 1 & 2 of THE PEACEKEEPERS and hopefully we'll hit a few stretch goals along the way so we can give you more bang for your Kickstarter buck.
All hell breaks loose in a quaint northern Michigan community when a team of in-over-their-heads bank robbers kills a beloved Sheriff’s Deputy. In a small town with BIG secrets, local detective Richard Holton races to peel back the layers of a depraved down home conspiracy before the bungling Federal Agents assigned to the case send everyone involved to ground. 
FROM RYLEND: I’m a screenwriter by trade. For over a decade, I’ve made my living writing smart, mind-bending thrillers for directors like JJ Abrams, Ridley Scott, Justin Lin, John Woo, Luc Besson, and F. Gary Gray, so I can’t help but think of things in cinematic terms. The Peacekeepers is a dark, quirky crime drama in the vein of Fargo or No Country for Old Men. It’s a love letter to case-a-season police dramas like True Detective and The Wire, to Elmore Leonard novels, and to comic masterpieces like Criminal and 100 Bullets.
Now tell us that doesn't sound cool!
Not ready to dive in just yet? Well, then check out this pu pu platter of wicked and wild previews!
MEET THE ROBBERS... 
MEET THE COPS... 
MEET THE WRESTLERS...
MEET THE GIRL NEXT DOOR...
I know what you're all thinking now. "That was TONS OF FUN, but what do we get if we pledge?" Well, I'm glad you asked. First, there's--
We're looking to print THE PEACEKEEPERS on a heavy 80 lb paper stock with a 100 lb glossy cover. This thing is perfect bound. When you pick up one of our books, you'll feel the difference. This is very much a Cadillac. A heavier stock and perfect binding also makes the comic less likely to be damaged in transit.
Here is the "regular" cover by Davi Leon Dias and Iwan Joko Triyono: 
We're also offering three UBER-limited variant covers you'll only be able to procure here on Kickstarter. Feast your eyes on these:
THE HEAT HOMAGE VARIANT - Dias & Triyono
For those who sometimes just have to get it on. For those who will rock 'n roll at the drop of a hat. For those who are prepared to walk out on anything in 30 seconds flat if they feel the heat around the corner.

THE FARGO HOMAGE VARIANT - Dias & Triyono
Oh Geez... this is a good one, don'tcha know... a no-rough-stuff-type deal.

THE POINT BREAK VARIANT - Dias & Triyono
Here's one for the reader who only lives to get radical. Admit it... you want this one so bad, it's like acid in your mouth. Vaya con Dios, compadre!
GREAT covers, right? Having trouble choosing just one? Well, why not GRAB THEM ALL?!
NOTE: Special "Early Bird" tiers are available for ONLY the first 48 HOURS of the campaign. Get in early and SAVE!
We're offering all sorts of other fun stuff to backers. Take a look below for the short and skinny, and please feel free to message with any specific questions.

PDFs of the Ringo Award-Nominated Banjax #1 and the Ringo Award-Winning Aberrant #1 
What better way to get to know us than by taking a long look at the work we've done before? ALL backers of this Kickstarter will essentially receive FOUR badass comic issues for the price of one AND...

A MEATY PREVIEW OF THE JUMP #1 
Again, we're still getting to know each other here... so why not check out our last book/the book that took Kickstarter by storm? The Jump is a kick-you-in-the-teeth paranoid thriller set in the world of astral projection AND YOU'RE GONNA LOVE IT!

RYLEND GRANT'S SCRIPTS FOR THE PEACEKEEPERS 1 & 2
Love to see how the sausage gets made? Everyone who pledges the digital deluxe tier and higher will get Rylend Grant's (2019 Ringo Award nominee for BEST WRITER) scripts for Issues 1 & 2 of THE PEACEKEEPERS!

PUBLISHER PITCH DOCUMENT
Want to see how the pros present their ideas to real deal publishers? Everyone who pledges the digital deluxe tier and higher will get Rylend Grant's series pitch document for THE PEACEKEEPERS!

DIGITAL FILES FOR ALL PENCILS, INKS, & COLORS 
A process junkie's DREAM! See how the book gets made from start to finish. Backers of the Digital Deluxe - Artist Edition tier and above will receive digital files for all pencils, inks, & colors!

THE RYLEND GRANT DIGITAL LIBRARY
Get ahold of digital versions of all of Rylend Grant's work. The Ringo Award-winning ABERRANT - Seasons 1 & 2, The Ringo-nominated BANJAX - Season 1, THE JUMP #1, and TALES FROM THE WORLD OF MONSTER MATADOR.
NOTE: Signed physical copies and RARE variants will be available as add-ons once you pick your tier. See info below.

ORIGINAL ART - HAND-DRAWN/INKED CHARACTERS FROM THE PEACEKEEPERS
Score a one-of-a kind piece of original hand-drawn/inked art from Davi Leon Dias. These are A5 format (roughly 6x8 inches) and feature characters from THE PEACEKEEPERS. YOU PICK WHO WE DRAW!

ORIGINAL ART - B&W COMMISSION FROM DAVI LEON DIAS 
Got something you want drawn? Well, then why not commission PEACEKEEPERS/ABERRANT artist Davi Leon Dias to draw you an original B&W pin up? You pick the subject matter.

ORIGINAL ART - FULL COLOR COMMISSION
Got something you want drawn? Davi will still do it, but why not go the extra mile and have your piece rendered in full, beautiful color? Again, you pick the subject matter.

PUT ME ON A COVER!  
We will put your face/likeness on any of our covers (you choose). You then decide if you'd like a digital file and beautiful physical print or if you'd like to receive an ACTUAL PHYSICAL COMIC ISSUE WITH YOUR MUG ON IT!
DRAW ME IN!  
Score a cameo in the book! Davi will draw you into an actual scene in THE PEACEKEEPERS 1 or 2.

 DRAW ME IN AND GIVE ME LINES!    
Score a more prominent speaking role in the book! Davi will draw you in as a supporting character in THE PEACEKEEPERS 1 or 2 and WE'LL GIVE YOU LINES OF DIALOGUE.

AN ORIGINAL PEACEKEEPERS STORY STARRING YOU!  
We will write and draw an original 5-page story that takes place in the universe of THE PEACEKEEPERS that stars YOU as the protagonist!

ONE-ON-ONE SKYPE SESSION WITH RYLEND GRANT
Rylend is a Ringo Award-winning comic creator and has spent 15 years developing film/TV projects with folks like Ridley Scott, JJ Abrams, John Woo, & Luc Besson. Here's your chance to pick his brain during an hour-long Skype session. Need Film/TV/Comic pitch feedback? Comic book how-to? Getting your 1st book published? YOU set the agenda.

BECOME A PRODUCER 
After working in Hollywood for 15+ years, Rylend has an impressive track record of setting his fiction and comic properties up as film and television projects. To date, Rylend's stories have attracted talent like JJ Abrams, Justin Lin, F. Gary Gray, Robert Deniro, and Daveed Diggs. Well, here is your chance to become a producer on THE PEACEKEEPERS property. You'll receive the agreed upon credit in book (RIGHT NEXT TO THE WRITER, ARTIST, COLORIST, & LETTERER) and on any future films, TV shows, etc.

RETAIL TIER
Retailers can order 10 copies of THE PEACEKEEPERS (you tell us which covers) at a special discounted rate and we'll throw in a ton of cool extras... signed copies of Aberrant and Banjax... uber rare con variants. DM for details!
We've been selected by Kickstarter this go 'round to test their new Add-Ons interface. So, we'll be offering some REALLY COOL extras for you over the course of the campaign. To start, you'll see plenty of signed physical copies of ABERRANT, BANJAX, and THE JUMP... single issues and TPBs... as well as our entire digital library. You will be able add these while confirming your pledge tier here on Kickstarter.
We'll also be offering a number of UBER RARE con-exclusive variants of our previous books. We'll post those here once they go live. Here's a list of what's available now:
1. ABERRANT #1 - Weekend at Bernie's Homage Variant 
This is a PopCultHQ-exclusive Ringo-Awards Variant of Aberrant - Issue 1. It was limited to just 125 copies. It originally sold for $15, but backers can get it here for just $10. It'll also come SIGNED (unless you prefer otherwise). I've never signed one of these until now.

2. BANJAX #1 - Demon in a Bottle Homage Variant
This is a PopCultHQ-exclusive Ringo-Awards Variant of BANJAX - Issue 1. It was limited to just 250 copies. Backers can get it here for just $15. It'll also come SIGNED (unless you prefer otherwise). Again, I've never signed one of these until now.

3. BANJAX #1 - SDCC 2019 Exclusive GREMLINS Variant
This is a San Diego Comic Con 2019 Exclusive Variant of Banjax - Issue 1. It was only available for a single weekend at SDCC in 2019. It's UBER limited. The print run was just 50. It's cost you $20. It'll also come SIGNED (unless you prefer otherwise).

4. ABERRANT - Season 2 #1 - SDCC 2019 Exclusive KARATE KID Variant
This is a San Diego Comic Con 2019 Exclusive Variant of Aberrant - Season 2 - Issue 1. It was only available for a single weekend at SDCC in 2019. It's UBER limited. The print run was just 50. It's cost you $20. It'll also come SIGNED (unless you prefer otherwise).

5. ABERRANT #1 - SDCC 2018 Exclusive COMING TO AMERICA Homage Variant
This is a San Diego Comic Con 2018 Exclusive Variant of Aberrant - Issue 1. It was only available for a single weekend at SDCC in 2018. It's UBER limited. The print run was just 50. It's cost you $20. It'll also come SIGNED (unless you prefer otherwise). 
We LOVE stretch goals!  And if we're lucky enough to reach our initial funding goal, we'll unlock a slew of really cool extra rewards for our backers.
-STRECH GOAL #1 - $7,000 - BONUS DIGITAL EXTRAVAGANZA! (UNLOCKED)
If we can reach our $7,000 goal, we'll be giving our backers A TON of extra digital books from some of the hottest creators in comics!
-STRETCH GOAL #2 - $10,000 - Exclusive Print  (UNLOCKED)
If we can reach $10,000, we'll be giving this stunning print to all of our backers:
-STRETCH GOAL #2 - $13,000 - The Rylend Grant Comicsverse Card set! Trading cards featuring character/iconic covers from Rylend's greatest comic hits... Banjax, Aberrant, The Jump, and of course, The Peacekeepers.
-STRETCH GOAL #2 - $16,000 - (to be revealed)
THE PEACEKEEPERS has sprung from the wicked minds of Hollywood screenwriter/Ringo Award-winning comic creator Rylend Grant, artist Davi Leon Dias, colorist Iwan Joko Triyono, and letterer HdE... the very same team that brought you 10 ass-kicking Issues of ABERRANT (published Action Lab: Danger Zone). 
ABERRANT - won a prestigious Mike Wieringo Comic Book Award ("Ringo Award") in 2019 for BEST VILLAIN and was nominated for two others... BEST SINGLE ISSUE and BEST WRITER (alongside Jeff Lemire, Scott Snyder, Brian K. Vaughn, and Brian Michael Bendis).
And here's what the critics had to say:
“Go home, other comics people. Rylend Grant and Zsombor Huszka just killed the game…” (Charles Pulliam-Moore – i09)
“ABERRANT offers an intense, near-cinematic reading experience that incites excitement and inspires interest for issues to come.” (The Brazen Bull)
“Aberrant flat-out works. You have visceral action scenes. Personalities practically ooze out of the page. Honestly, this is the kind of storytelling that the big publishers are missing.” (Big Comic Page)
“…a bleak, dangerous and serious story with a lot at stake…. If you like revenge tales, military thrillers, and superheroes, ‘Aberrant’ has it all.” (Spartantown)
“ABERRANT #1 is a game-changer at Action Lab: Danger Zone. You’ll become captivated almost immediately… The creative team put together one of the most seamless, cohesive, and dynamic collaborations I’ve seen this year on the indie scene.” (PopCultHQ)
 And ABERRANT was quickly optioned for television by 24 & FELICITY Executive Producer Tony Krantz! 
Rylend's last book - the dark and decidedly wicked superhero noir, BANJAX - was just nominated for FOUR 2020 Ringo Awards including BEST SERIES.
It made over a dozen ten-best lists and the critics raved:
“This is the most amazingly well done first issue of a series I have ever seen. Point blank. Period… You cannot read this and come out if the same way you went into it… So effin’ good.” (Steven Leitman, Reading with a Flight Ring)
“Banjax has all the action, violence, grit, and heart of a classic.” (David Pepose, Creator of Spencer & Locke)
“Quality, engrossing material embedded with a cinematic feel. Gifted storytelling and breathtaking artwork. Banjax will instantly have you screaming for more!” (Jason Bennett, PopCultHQ)
“Banjax hits incredibly hard. Intense, thought-provoking, wildly entertaining. It’s near perfect. For those looking for something unique, Issue #1 is a must-read.” (Charlie Chipman, The Brazen Bull)
“Riveting. Refreshing. Heart-breaking. Ultra-violent. Honestly, a bit unsettling. The artwork of Fábio Alves is everything a dark and gritty comic should embody. Edson Ferreira’s color work adds an extra punch to really emotional panels. Don’t miss out on this bloody good time! A+” (Andrew Huard, You Don’t Read Comics)
“Holy crap this is good. This book hits all the right notes. It’s marvelously done, such a compelling story. It’s the best comic I’ve read in a long time. Honestly? Bendis could take some notes here.” (ComicCast Podcast)

And our last Kickstarter effort, THE JUMP, took the site by storm...
“Out of this world. Grant delivers another cinematic thrill-ride. THE JUMP is a beautiful medley of fascination and wonder, filled with engaging characters, sprinkled with humor and heart, a healthy dose of intrigue, all wrapped up with a compelling premise.” (Jason Bennet - PopCultHQ)
“THE JUMP is a massive good time. The pacing is phenomenal. The line work is superb. The color work is brilliant. The is fresh, new, and unique. This is why we love comics.” (Steve Leitman - Reading with a Flight Ring)

MUCH MORE LOVE TO COME ON THE PEACEKEEPERS!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
THE PEACEKEEPERS is brought to you by a team of steadily working professionals that has collaborated previously and delivered an exceptional, critically-acclaimed, Ringo Award-winning book. We've done a very successful Kickstarter previously (THE JUMP) and delivered a great product on time. We promise, you will like what you get.

Our printer is considered an essential business, so it is up and running and we aim to fulfill this project fast. Right now, the biggest risk is that the postal service will see disruptions due to the COVID trouble/lack of funding. We sincerely hope this won't be a problem... but if it is, we'll get your books to you via an alternate service.

We're committed to delivering the best possible experience to our backers, so we're investing in top-of-the-line shipping materials, and are handling fulfillment 100% in-house. This will eliminate the risk of delivery delays and to make sure your rewards arrive in excellent condition. Most importantly, I (Rylend) will address every question personally. The buck stops here. If you have a question... if you have a problem... I'm here for you.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Put Me on a Cover - PHYSICAL ISSUE!!!
support.descp:

support.title: Associate Producer Credit
support.descp:

To date, Rylend's stories have attracted talent like JJ Abrams, Justin Lin, F. Gary Gray, Robert Deniro, and Daveed Diggs. Well, here is your chance to become an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER on THE PEACEKEEPERS property. You'll receive the agreed upon credit in book (RIGHT NEXT TO THE WRITER, ARTIST, COLORIST, & LETTERER) and on any future films, TV shows, etc.

updates.update_userinfo: Rylend Grant's SUICIDE JOCKEYS is coming to your local comic shop in August via Source Point Press!
updates.update_content:
Hey Peacekeepers,
I hope this message find you well. I'm writing to let you know that both the regular and "Road House" variant editions of the first issue of my latest and greatest comic book series - a delightfully twisted Tokusatsu action joint, titled SUICIDE JOCKEYS - is available NOW for preorder at your local comic shop. Preorders drive everything, so help a brother out, huh? You can also have it easily shipped directly to your home by ordering online via MIDTOWN COMICS. 

SUICIDE JOCKEYS will run for 4 issues, so PUT IT ON YOUR PULL LIST!

Check out a best-in-the-business preview from Jason Bennett at PopCultHQ . And peep the official press release from Source Point Press below. Trust me, you're in for quite a ride with this one!

Hey Peacekeepers,
Are you thinking about running your own Kickstarter campaign? Well, I’m doing this badass crowdfunding seminar with the folks over at Global Comix TONIGHT @ 5pm pst/8pm est where I take you through the entire build of my THE JUMP - Issue 2 campaign & answer questions ‘til I drop. updates.update_userinfo: THE JUMP #2 launches one week from today!
updates.update_content:
Hey all,
Just a friendly reminder that Issue 2 of my kick-you-in-the-teeth astral projection thriller THE JUMP launches here on Kickstarter ONE WEEK FROM TODAY (March 22nd)! Did you miss out on Issue 1? NO WORRIES! This is your chance to catch up/hop aboard the fun train!
We are currently at 116 followers! Please help us get to 150! Check out our PRELAUNCH PAGE and click the green NOTIFY ME ON LAUNCH button.

Hello all,
  Well, those books just keep on landing and I am seeing some truly inspiring things on social media. Just a reminder, I'm going to give something very special to a few of you who post pictures of your books and tag me (@rylendgrant) on social media... more bonkers the better.
Here are some early highlights for you guys:

It's always a delight to see man, child and beast enjoying your comic books...

project_data.project_name: THE PEACEKEEPERS 1 & 2 From Ringo Award-Winner Rylend Grant

campaign.story:
STRETCH GOAL: 25k!
STRETCH GOAL $20k -- UNLOCKED!

STORY
A stolen car and a botched robbery pushes one man to the precipice, where he must choose between the life of his closest friend, and that of a complete stranger. 

MURDER BOOK
“Murder book” refers to a detective's case file on a homicide investigation. Murder books typically include crime scene photographs and sketches, autopsy and forensic reports, transcripts of investigator’s notes and witness interviews. They chronicle the life of a case, from the time the murder is reported until an arrest is made.
CATCH & RELEASE: A MURDER BOOK STORY is an original graphic novel about crime and consequence. It’s written by me, Ed Brisson (Old Man Logan, Uncanny X-Men), and lusciously illustrated by Lisandro Estherren (Redneck, Strange Skies of East Berlin). This stand-alone graphic novel will be published in an exclusive hardcover edition for Kickstarter backers.
Cover by Lisandro Estherren
After nearly half a decade away from writing crime comics -- a genre I love more than any other -- I’m making a return with the Kickstarter Exclusive Hardcover edition of CATCH & RELEASE: A MURDER BOOK STORY. This book is near and dear to my heart, and probably the most pure distillation of the kind of book that I want to write.

CATCH & RELEASE: A MURDER BOOK STORY is about a thief who concocts a plan to sell a stolen car not once, but several times, by luring unsuspecting buyers to a remote location and robbing them at gunpoint. His plan hits a snag when he encounters a student, who needs a fresh set of wheels to travel to his new life out West. When things go south, they go south hard, and now our car thief stands on a precipice where he has to make a choice that will affect not only his life, but that of his co-conspirator and their two victims. The story is an examination of one man’s guilt and how far he’s willing to go to stay out of jail. 
Art by Lisandro Estherren
When I started writing the script -- the longest MURDER BOOK story to date -- I knew that there was only one artist who could do it justice: Lisandro Estherren. He and I had previously worked together on THE LAST CONTRACT for BOOM! Studios and have been looking for an excuse to team up once again. Thankfully, he was into the story and happy to come aboard to breathe life into this story about a deception and redemption.
Art by Lisandro Estherren

THE TEAM
Ed Brisson has been creating comics in one form or another since 1994. He’s best known for his work at Marvel on books such as UNCANNY X-MEN, IRON FIST, GHOST RIDER, OLD MAN LOGAN and X-FORCE. He also has a long history of writing creator-owned books such as COMEBACK (Image), SHELTERED (Image), THE LAST CONTRACT (BOOM!) and THE VIOLENT (Image).

Ed first started to gain recognition from his self-published series MURDER BOOK, which was collected and released by Dark Horse in 2015.
Lisandro Estherren is a comic artist based in Argentina. His work includes graphic novels, series, and illustration for publishers and magazines such as Editorial Pictus (Argentina), Aurea Editoriale (Italy) Diábolo (Spain) and Mojito (Uruguay). In the US, he has produced series for Red5 Comics (Spook) and BOOM! Studios (The Last Contract). He is currently working on REDNECK for Skybound Comics.
Hassan Otsmane-Elhaou makes Strip Panel Naked, a YouTube series focusing on breaking down comic art. He also does this a lot on his twitter (@HassanOE). He might make films that you'd like.
Linney Incorporated is run by editor/writer/producer Nate Cosby, who's worked on Cow Boy, Thor The Mighty Avenger, Red Sonja, Jim Henson's The Storyteller, World War Hulk, Spider-Man Loves Mary Jane, James Bond, The Wonderful World Of Oz, Flash Gordon and sooooooooo many more books.

WHY KICKSTARTER
I’ve been a fan of the Kickstarter publishing method for years now and have always wanted to bring a project here, where we can cut out the middleman and create a book for readers, backed by readers.

Kickstarter allows Lisandro and I to maintain complete control over the story and production of the book, creating a work that is as purely a product of our love for the genre and medium.

The money raised through this campaign will be used to pay the creative team and for printing of the hardcover book.

WHAT YOU CAN GET
We are delighted to print this stand alone story in a Kickstarter exclusive deluxe hardcover, as well as a digital edition of the book. CATCH & RELEASE: A MURDER BOOK STORY is a 72 page book, printed at standard comic size (6.625 x 10.25 inches).

Aside from the book itself, we have plenty of fun rewards including commissions from Declan Shalvey and Micheal Walsh; script reviews from Matthew Rosenberg and Kelly Thompson; original artwork; and even a chance to appear in the book yourself!

A NOTE ON SHIPPING
Because of how quickly shipping rates can change and the unexpected nature of the world, shipping costs will be added on later, when we ship the book out to you in 2021. You will get a survey from BackerKit where you will be asked for your address, and shipping costs will be calculated at that point. We will do the best we can to make shipping as affordable as possible. Our current shipping estimates are as follows (but these may change if shipping rates increase): $4 US  / $10 Canada / $25 EU, GB and elsewhere. 
Canadian orders will ship from Canada, all other orders will ship from the US.
THANK YOU!
Thank you to our families and readers for getting us this far!
Kickstarter Campaign Manager: 
Laser Malena-Webber lasercampaigns.com
Music credit for video:
Doomsday Clock by Rafael Krux
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/5402-doomsday-clock-
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Any project has its risks in creation, manufacturing delays, and the unexpectedness of the world. But we've all got years of experience meeting monthly comics deadlines, and we've given ourselves plenty of time to bring you an incredible book.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Get the Kickstarter exclusive hardcover edition of Catch & Release: A Murder Book Story with a bookplate featuring a sketch by Ed Brisson that is also signed by Ed Brisson and Lisandro Estherren. Also includes a digital edition of Catch & Release: A Murder Book Story.

support.title: Classic Murder
support.descp:
Get your hands on the original print editions of Murder Book #1, #2 and #3. These are the original self-published issues of Murder Book, published between 2010-2012. I thought I'd sold out of these, but just found a small stash hidden away in a box from my last move.
Each issue includes two stories and were illustrated by Simon Roy, Michael Walsh, Vic Malhotra, Johnny Christmas and Jason Copland. The print run on each was roughly 1,000 and these sets are among the last copies, so act quick!
Each issue will be signed by Ed Brisson.
In addition, you also get the Kickstarter exclusive hardcover edition of Catch & Release: A Murder Book Story with a bookplate signed by Ed Brisson and Lisandro Estherren, as well as the Digital Edition of the book.
Shipping will be added after the campaign!
INCLUDES:
Hardcover Book
Digital book
Bookplate signed by Ed Brisson and Lisandro Estherren

Alright, we're thrilled to be able to offer up a commission from Steve McNiven (Old Man Logan, Civil War). The commission is standard comic page size paper (11x17), inked, one character only.
In addition, you get the Kickstarter exclusive hardcover edition of Catch & Release: A Murder Book Story with a bookplate signed by Ed Brisson and Lisandro Estherren.
Shipping will be added after the campaign.
INCLUDES:
Hardcover Book
Digital book
Bookplate signed by Ed Brisson and Lisandro Estherren
Commission

updates.update_content:
Lisandro just handed in up to page 50, and should have the book complete in the next 2-3 weeks, at which point, Hass will be lettering and we'll be proofing to get that sucker ready for print.
Once we sign off on the final, we'll be prepping the digital rewards at the same time that the book heads off to the printer.
If you backed at the original art from the book tier, you'll be able to look through the digital edition of the book and select which page(s) you'd like. Working out the specifics, but will probably ask everyone to give 3 pages that they'd like, in order of preference. I'll be fulfilling them in the order that folks backed the project.

Hey folks!
Not a lot to report. Lisandro is deep into the book and things are looking good for a June release.
About half of the commission tiers have already been sent, with a couple more done and about to be mailed.

updates.update_userinfo: A Quick Update: Commissions and Script Reviews.
updates.update_content:
Hey folks!
Hope the holidays were kind to you.
Took a couple weeks off to lay low during the holidays, but am back at it as of today.
Not much new to report, but wanted to update those who backed the commission and script review tiers. I'll be reaching out to you over the course of the day to organize your rewards.  With script reviews, there's no additional shipping, but with commissions there will be. The easiest way I figure we can work that out is that we'll get your commissions set up now and they'll mail closer to the release date of the book so that we can calculate a shipping rate that is as close to accurate as possible.
WE DID IT!

updates.update_userinfo: We did it! Director's Cut Unlocked! Next stretch goal!
updates.update_content:
Hey folks,

We're in the final week of this sucker, so I thought I'd drop a quick note to let you know about a few things that we'll be doing in these last seven days.

NEW COMMISSION REWARD TIERS

project_data.project_name: Catch & Release: A Murder Book Story

campaign.story:
Unlocked Bonus Items for Reward Tiers with Physical Shipments!



MENAGERIE: DECLASSIFIED ANTHOLOGY
Reward Tiers: 3, 3A, 3B, 3C, & 3D
THIS IS THE MAIN EVENT!  The purpose of this campaign is to finance the completion and printing of  the Menagerie: Declassified Anthology.  The core of this science fiction anthology contains ten original stories by some of the BEST voices in comics.  From Marvel and DC to IDW, Zenescope, and yes, Kickstarter, these writer and artist teams have never worked together before, but have been paired up to bring unique corners of the Menagerie Universe to life.  Brandon Easton (Transformers: War for Cybertron - Siege, Agent Carter, Judge Dredd: False Witness, Thundercats), Geoffrey Thorne (The Avengers: Black Panther's Quest, Black Panther [MARVEL], The Librarians, Leverage), Bryan Edward Hill (Batman & The Outsiders, Killmonger, Zone 414, Postal, The new unnamed Power Rangers movie) and MORE contributed to this book.
So, yes, this anthology is the main event and you don't have to read the series to follow along or understand the meanings of these powerful, subversive and often cautionary tales.  
MENAGERIE: Declassified Anthology - Main Cover (REWARD TIER 3)
The very first issue of Menagerie was funded on Kickstarter just a few short years ago and since then, you have helped us bring to life over 100+ pages of that story, set in a world of endless wars and the struggle to establish freedom. The Menagerie Universe has been a lot of fun to build.
MENAGERIE: Declassified Anthology Cover D --> (REWARD TIER #3D)
IF YOU'RE ONLY HERE FOR MENAGERIE #5 
Well, first we think you're missing out on the best series of prequel stories we could have put together by top talent that is writing for Marvel, DC, and the major movie studios.  BUT we totally understand if you want to finish the first "season" of the series before you get to that or you're on a budget.   So, we definitely want to accommodate return readers by including these new Reward Tiers (since launch) under the [REPEAT BACKER] designation.  So you can get either a Digital or Physical copy of Menagerie #5 with either of those two Reward Tiers.

HERE'S THE COVER ART FOR MENAGERIE #5:  
Menagerie V: Main Cover by David Monge Bautista (Now Available by selecting "Here for the Add-Ons" Tier and then choosing Menagerie #5 as an Add-On (for $8 + Shipping) when prompted at check out.

 We've had so much positive feedback, and with our epic conclusion to the first arc here, we wanted to address a question that constantly comes up:
"When will you be bringing in outside talent to write for Myth Division?" 
Well, the answer is: NOW!

For the first time, Ramón, the writer, creator and editor of the Menagerie series has put together this Anthology, a series of eight page sci-fi stories set in the Menagerie Universe. He asked some friends who work in the comic book, film and television industries if they'd contribute a story. 
They agreed and each of their stories features one of the main characters we've already met in the first four issues of Menagerie.
So who are these characters again?
The Mutineers are all ready to start over.... but who were they before they deserted the war? Find out in this Anthology.
Since the fifth issue is the final issue of this introductory arc, we decided to ADD it along with this campaign!  So whether you've got all four issues and have been waiting for the fifth or if you've never read an issue and want the whole set, you can catch up with ease.  All of this is in addition to the 100+ Page Anthology.
The only catch is we currently aren't offering is the DIGITAL COPY OF MENAGERIE ISSUE #5!!  *GASP!* 
We know!! It's a heartbreaker for a few loyal backers, but we assure you, this isn't meant to slight anyone especially our supportive readers!!  It's more of a necessary effort to combat future piracy, so we're actively looking for a better way to deliver these rewards & protect the future sales of these stories.  (After all, we want your Kickstarter Exclusives to be WORTH SOMETHING down the road). 
The good news is that the digital conclusion to the five issue arc WILL be found in the printed collection of MENAGERIE: Volume 1 (REWARD TIER #2) and we hope you'll pick up a copy of that, which will include some sketches, notes and other cool behind the scenes content in the back of the book!!.
MENAGERIE: Declassified Anthology Cover A --> (REWARD TIER #3A)
Now, that's just the first nine stories.  There are up to fourteen stories in total to UNLOCK, each taking place BEFORE the events of our first Menagerie Series Arc (#1-5), which is available as a Trade Paperback (REWARD TIER #2) or if you're lucky you can still snag one of the rare add-ons compiling the 5 individual issues.  These stories are a prelude or mini-prequels to the ongoing series, really.  It's a great way to finish up the first arc.

9 STORIES COLLECTED INTO ONE: 
THE ANTHOLOGY
We've invited many of our recurring collaborators to participate along with a few new creators that we've wanted to collaborate with for some time.
These stories are the "Declassified" tales of First Contact with non-human, intelligent life throughout the explored Galaxy, featuring the people we meet in Menagerie #1-5. 
MENAGERIE: Declassified Anthology Cover C --> (REWARD TIER #3C)
A lone wolf searches for a pack in the frozen wasteland of an outlier planet.
THE GLUTTON by Omar Morales & Erwin Arroza
The Glutton Interiors.
A man wrestles with his decision to disobey his father's wishes when he is asked to do the unthinkable.
LOST ONE'S by Robert Jeffrey II, Bruno Lima, & Fahriza Kamaputra
Lost One's Interiors.
Sometimes we're reminded that what we want isn't remotely close to what we might need. Brandon Easton's other Comic titles and Television Series include: Transformers: War for Cybertron - Siege, Judge Dredd: False Witness, Marvel Action Spider-man, Thundercats, Agent Carter, Miracle Man (DC Future State), Incidentals, and more...
Eclipse Interior Art by Ricardo Arreola, Juan Castro & Sean Lee.
Eclipse Interior Art.
In the face of certain death, it's not often we learn more about the Universe than ourselves.
INFINITY TREE by Madeleine Holly-Rosing & Edgy Ziane
INFINITY TREE Interiors.
Violence isn't usually the answer, but sometimes it can even spell total destruction for all involved.
BREATH OF A PREDATOR by Carrie Tupper, Abel Cicero & Edgy Ziane



Invasion isn't always a cut and dry formula. Sometimes, the enemy is not what you think. Geoffrey's other Comic Titles and Television Series include: Black Panther, The Avengers: Black Panther's Quest, The Librarians, Mosaic, Last Lanterns (DC Future State), Avengers Assemble: Secret Wars
ADAPTATION by Geoff Thorne & Rob Nix.
Adaptation Interiors.
It's just a little celebratory single malt. What could possibly go wrong?
TRADITION by Mamode Ogbewele & Ario Murti
Tradition Interior Art by Ario Murti
What is the cost of saving a life in uncharted space?
POUND OF MESH by Nandini Bapat, Miguel Angel Ruiz & Leonardo Paciarotti
Pound of Mesh Interiors by Nandini Bapat, Miguel Angel Ruiz, & Leonardo Paciarotti
Can the created ever surpass its creator?
FAUX SUPREMACY by Brian L. Hawkins, Adam Stone & Walter Pereyra
Faux Supremacy Interior Art by Adam Stone & Ifansyah Noor

AND MORE STORIES TO BE UNLOCKED AS STRETCH GOALS... 
Reward 1
Reward 2
Reward 3
Reward 3A
Reward 3B

Reward 3C
Reward 3D. Menagerie: Declassified Anthology (Cover D)
Reward 4. Menagerie: Declassified Anthology (Main Cover) + Menagerie Volume 1 (KS Exclusive Cover)
STRETCH GOALS WILL BE REVEALED WHEN WE HIT $5,000!!!
AVAILABLE AS ADD-ON ONLY. Sorry for any disappointment, but these are in such limited quantities we can't offer it as a primary reward. Thanks for your support!! You've made these a hit!!!
AVAILABLE AS ADD-ON ONLY. Sorry for any hard feelings or depression that might set in as a result. We are just so low on this popular collection that we can't offer it as a primary reward. Besides, the focus here is the anthology!! Thanks for understanding!

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
1. Wait! Did I miss Menagerie #5???
Answer: No. We just decided to offer this Anthology BEFORE we closed out the series and got a lot of crap for it, so we decided to ADD-ON that issue along with the entire Volume 1 Collection! 
SO, IF YOU WANT MENAGERIE #5:
to get a Printed Copy of Menagerie #5 just choose the first $5 Reward Tier: "HERE FOR THE ADD-ONS" and select Menagerie #5 as your Add-On at checkout.  
To get a Digital PDF Copy just choose the $5 "HERE FOR THE ADD-ONS" Reward Tier to pledge.

2. Can I get a Digital Copy of Menagerie #5???  I NEED IT!!!!
Answer:  After debating the issue, we realized some of you would burn this place down if we didn't, so yes, all you have to do is: 
To get a Digital Copy just choose the $5 "HERE FOR THE ADD-ONS" Reward Tier to pledge.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 10th successful Kickstarter Book, so we feel confident we can overcome any challenge to ensure delivery. 

But as with all things, there are always unknown factors that can cause a delay. That's why we've made a commitment to keep you informed every step of the way, not only during the campaign, but until every reward is shipped.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

This is where it all started. Funded right here on Kickstarter, you can get the first 5 issues of Menagerie collected into a single volume. Catch up on the story to find out what happens to the characters you'll read about in the Menagerie: Declassified Anthology.
Glossy, full color pages, this book is made with Perfect Binding. Perfect Binding is the binding method in which pages are folded, gathered, sewn, and then glued into a cover, forming a squared-off spine-bound softcover book like most traditional Graphic Novels.

updates.update_userinfo: MENAGERIE 5 is going to color! MENAGERIE 1 is going to LOCAL COMIC SHOPS!
updates.update_content:
Thank you all so much for your patience and support!
It is because of backers like you that the MENAGERIE series has come this far, and we are thrilled to share that we've found a distribution deal that ensures our growing little imprint keeps 100% of our ownership of the project.  This is good news for you because it means that we can continue to launch these Kickstarter campaigns and offer you exclusive stuff (which will get better and better over time), BEFORE the books hit local comic shops.

updates.update_userinfo: The Anthology is in Final Page Review then going to the Printer!!! Surveys coming SOON!!
updates.update_content:
108 pages of sequential art.
None of it was possible without the visionary teams that wrote, drew and colored the stories, but equally important was your role in making this book a reality.
So, thank you again. I just did a final read-through of the book in sequential order and I must say, I'm very proud of all the work contributed to this book.

updates.update_userinfo: The Anthology is Lettered!!! Menagerie 05 in Progress!!
updates.update_content:
What a journey!!!
I've been quiet for the last few weeks, but for VERY good reason.  I am finally giving the last notes on the Letter Design for the twelve stories included in this Anthology.
Yes, you read that right--> There will be TWELVE stories included in this anthology, and let me tell you the level of talent in this single book will astonish ANY comic book collector.

updates.update_userinfo: 3.5 Months and 90 Pages Later... We are Almost finished!! Take a Look!
updates.update_content:
We've come a long way and with twelve teams hard at work on MENAGERIE: Declassified while David and Sean tackle the next issue in the series (#5), I've been doing my best to manage the entire process and provide notes and guidance when necessary.  
After getting 10 of 12 stories through the color process, I have to say that this book is absolutely stunning.  The sequences, the lines, the colors and yes, even the letter design is some of the most outstanding work I've seen in comics today.  That doesn't even highlight the incredible scripts that each writer was able to pour such depth and meaning into.  I'm beyond proud of the stories in this book, so I can't wait to get it to print.

updates.update_userinfo: Funds Transferred! Production Continues! Distribution Secured! New Page to Show!
updates.update_content:
Just wanted to pop in to say thank you again for your support of MENAGERIE: Declassified!  I put a lot of time and thought into selecting the teams and I could not be more proud of what they've cooked up inside of this little universe.  After a quiet holiday, the rest of the art teams have begun sliding these final pages of the book into their January and February schedules.

Now, to avoid spoilers, I will NOT be sharing ALL of the pages as they are completed.  I will, however be sharing sneak peeks at various pages and panels that don't give away too much about the individual story twists & conclusions.

updates.update_userinfo: Over 200% and We Will Be in Stores & Libraries around the USA!
updates.update_content: Thank you all so much for your incredible support for this extremely special book.

updates.update_userinfo: 3rd Art Print Stretch Goal Unlocked + SPOTLIGHT: Brandon Easton!!
updates.update_content:
Thank you so much for helping us crush our initial goal and unlock all of these gorgeous prints!!!

NEW STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!!!
You have just unlocked the third Art Print, and quite frankly, one of my favorite images from the entire Anthology so far!  The 6x9 Art Print was drawn by Abel Cicero and Colored by Edgy Ziane.

We can't express our appreciation enough!!  You've helped us not only reach our goal, but double it.  For as small of an operation as I'm running, this will go a long way toward making the best book possible, so thank you again for your support of our flagship series, MENAGERIE.

If this is your first time backing one of my books, I want to thank you for taking a chance on our creative team. The Comics section of Kickstarter is JAM PACKED with some amazing talent, so we acknowledge your choice to grab a copy of one of our books.  That being said, we know the talent that was cherry-picked for this Anthology is some of the best in the industry... even if the industry hasn't figured that out just yet.

updates.update_userinfo: 2 Free Art Prints and a curse chasing Redhead?
updates.update_content:
You got us to this point and we can’t thank you enough!! Seriously, the best we can do is throw in a few special extras, JUST BECAUSE.... 
So, we’re adding TWO Reward Tiers!
At $9K, I’m throwing in Digital Copy of Alt Control Delete #1!  Here's the Main Cover of the book with art by Ariel Medel, Eddie Nuñez, Edgy Ziane, Elkys Nova Diaz & Dan Prado.

project_data.project_name: Menagerie: Declassified Anthology

campaign.story:
2020: Hard Times in the AnarchistJurisdiction (cover design not final)

At some point I started creating fake movie posters to keep from having a complete mental breakdown in 2020. Each of these posters was my attempt to deal with the raging insanity of 2020, from the COVID-19 pandemic to the political unrest all across America. I shared these posters on social media, just for a few laughs, but people liked what they saw, and asked how they could get copies. Well, here it is…a collection of more than 50 movie posters for films that don't really exist, chronicling a cinematic history that never really happened, in a world that’s nothing like the one we live in…except it actually is just like the world we live in!
2020: Hard Times in the Anarchist Jurisdiction includes more than 50 posters from such movies as Barefoot Vegan in the Anarchist Jurisdiction and The Mansplainer. The book will be approximately 70 pages, 8.5 inches wide by 11 inches tall, paperback, and in full color.
Four of the posters that will be in 2020: Hard Times in the Anarchist Jurisdiction
The print run of 2020: Hard Times in the Anarchist Jurisdiction will be limited to what is ordered during this campaign (which is just over two weeks long). I have already self-funded the publishing of 100 copies of the book that will be back from the printer before the campaign ends at the end of November. The goal is to ship orders in time for the holidays (though that is not a guarantee). All rewards in the United States will be sent priority via USPS, with an anticipated shipping date of December 11, 2020 (again...NOT a guarantee).
Because of the increased costs of shipping outside of the United States, foreign orders will be limited to one copy the book per backer. Foreign orders will not ship until January 2021. 
This campaign is to cover the cost of printing and shipping copies of 2020: Hard Times in the Anarchist Jurisdiction based on backer pledges, and this is the only time this collection will be available.
